title: Is my 3.87 a good GPA for medical school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Out of what? 4, 5 or 6. If out of 4 with A equals 4, B=3 etc, then very good. If you're questioning if a 3.87 is good enough, then maybe the scale has changed? 🤷‍♂️

I think it will depend on the school in question. With such G.P.A, YOU have a chance of being selected even dough there are some schools whose systems give them a 4.1 G.P.A. on other factors too. Such as your competitive exam scores depending on your country of studies.
